foreignData.name: Schlangenwesen
foreignData.text: {0}: Ziehe eine Karte. Das Schlangenwesen fügt in diesem Zug keinen Kampfschaden zu. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, wenn das Schlangenwesen angreift und nicht geblockt wird, und nur einmal pro Zug.

name: Ophidian
originalText: o0: Draw a card. Ophidian deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Ophidian is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.
